name: PortalMayham
description:
An Ethereal plane where you and your fellow souls are bound. It is one of many afterlife.

You and the other souls have been bound to this Ethereal realm of eternal vastness. The Evil Soul that holds you captive has to be defeated to free yourself and your people.
